nodes.text: Crystal mushroom soup was a soup dish served at the Bistro De Lothal restaurant on the planet Lothal by 5 BBY. The soup was available as the first course of a four-course meal of the day that the eatery served for 125 credits, the menu for which was advertised on fliers produced by the establishment.
Crystal mushroom soup was first mentioned in Rebel Journal by Ezra Bridger, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2014.
